clauses.title: Parties
clauses.summary: Identifies the landlord and tenant, establishing who is entering into the lease agreement.
obligations: Tenant must ensure their name and contact information are accurate.
risks: Incorrect identification can lead to legal issues or invalidation of the lease.
clauses.original_text: 1. PARTIES. This Residential Lease Agreement (“Agreement”) made this ___________ is between: Landlord Name: ____________________________________________ with a mailing address of: _________________________________________________ (“Landlord”), AND Tenant Name(s): ____________________________________________ (“Tenant(s)”). Landlord and Tenant are each collectively referred to as the "Parties."

clauses.title: Property
clauses.summary: Describes the property being leased, including its address and type, ensuring clarity on the premises.
obligations: Tenant should verify the property details match the actual premises.
risks: Discrepancies in property details can lead to disputes or invalidation of the lease.
clauses.original_text: 2. PROPERTY. The Landlord agrees to lease the described property to the Tenant: Address: ______________________________________________________ (“Premises”). Residence Type: ☐ Single-family ☐ Apartment ☐ Condominium ☐ Other: ____________

clauses.title: Term
clauses.summary: Specifies the start and end dates of the lease, defining the duration of the tenancy.
obligations: Tenant must adhere to the lease term and vacate the premises by the end date.
risks: Failing to vacate by the end date can result in penalties or legal action.
clauses.original_text: 3. TERM. The Agreement shall begin on _________________ and end on _________________ (“Term”).

clauses.title: Rent
clauses.summary: Details the monthly rent amount, due date, and payment instructions, ensuring timely payments.
obligations: Tenant must pay the rent on time and follow the specified payment instructions.
risks: Late or missed payments can result in late fees, eviction, or damage to credit score.
clauses.original_text: 4. RENT. The Tenant shall pay the Landlord in equal monthly installments of $___________ (“Rent”). The Rent shall be due on the ____ of every month and paid under the following instructions: ___________________________________________________________________________.

clauses.title: Security Deposit
clauses.summary: Specifies whether a security deposit is required and the conditions for its return, protecting against damages.
obligations: Tenant must pay the security deposit if required and understand the conditions for its return.
risks: Failure to pay the deposit can result in lease termination, and disputes over deductions can arise.
clauses.original_text: 5. SECURITY DEPOSIT. The Tenant (check one): ☐ Shall deposit with the Landlord the sum of $___________ as security for any damage caused to the Premises during the Term. Such deposit shall be returned to the Tenant, less any itemized deductions, within ______ days after the end of the Term. ☐ Shall NOT be required to pay a security deposit.
